title: Fateh box office collection Day 1: Sonu Sood starrer off to a slow start with Rs 2.45 crore debut - TOI Etimes
summary:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 1: Sonu Sood Starrer Off to a Slow Start with Rs 2.45 Crore Debut

Publication Date: [Date not provided] Source: Times of India

The much-anticipated action film Fateh, featuring Sonu Sood, opened to a subdued box office collection of Rs 2.45 crore on its first day.

  • The film revolves around themes of cybercrime, justice, and resilience.
  • Initial predictions estimated the film's first-day collection to be between Rs 70 lakh and Rs 1 crore.
  • Sood's return as a lead actor was highly anticipated, especially after his philanthropic work during the pandemic.
  • Fateh faces tough competition from major releases such as Ram Charan's Game Changer and Allu Arjun's Pushpa 2.
  • Industry experts suggest that positive word-of-mouth may improve the film's performance over the weekend.
  • Salman Khan showed support for Fateh, connecting it with a song he previously contributed to.
“I also have a contribution in the film Fateh. The song 'Heer' was very dear to me, but now it is part of this film.” - Salman Khan

As the weekend progresses, the success of 'Fateh' is dependent on audience response and critical reception.
newTitle: Fateh Box Office Collection: A Slow Start for Sonu Sood's Film

AAP Punjab MLA Gurpreet Gogi Bassi found dead due to gunshot wound under ‘mysterious circumstances’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
AAP Punjab MLA Gurpreet Gogi Bassi Found Dead from Gunshot Wound

Date: Jan 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

AAP MLA Gurpreet Gogi Bassi from Ludhiana West was declared dead due to a gunshot wound late Friday night, with the cause of death still under investigation.

  • Gurpreet Gogi Bassi was declared dead on arrival at Dayanand Medical College and Hospital.
  • An autopsy will confirm if his death was due to suicide or accidental firing.
  • Bassi had recently participated in community activities, including a cleanliness drive.
  • He joined AAP in 2022, defeating a two-time MLA in the elections.
“The cause of death is yet to be determined,” said commissioner Kuldeep Singh Chahal.

This tragic incident raises concerns about the safety of politicians and the circumstances surrounding such incidents in Punjab.
newTitle: AAP Punjab MLA Gurpreet Gogi Bassi Found Dead from Gunshot Wound

Cambodian man dies from H5N1 avian flu, possibly after eating sick chickens - University of Minnesota Twin Cities
summary:
Cambodian Man Dies from H5N1 Avian Flu After Possible Exposure to Sick Chickens

Date: January 10, 2025

Source: Avian Flu Diary

A 28-year-old man from Kampong Cham province in Cambodia has died from an H5N1 avian flu infection after being exposed to and possibly consuming sick chickens. This is the 19th human case of H5N1 identified in Cambodia since early 2023.

  • The patient exhibited symptoms including fever, difficulty breathing, cough, and fatigue.
  • His family raises chickens, and he cooked sick chickens for food.
  • This incident follows a previous fatal case in September 2024 involving a teenage girl.
  • Cambodian officials have not yet released details on the specific clade involved in this case.
The detection occurred during a surge in H5N1 cases in both humans and poultry.

The recent cases underline the ongoing threat of avian influenza in the region and the importance of monitoring and preventive measures.
newTitle: Cambodian Man Dies from H5N1 Avian Flu After Possible Exposure to Sick Chickens

summary:
Rekhachithram Box Office Collection Day 2

Publication Date: January 10, 2025

Source: Sacnilk

Rekhachithram performed well on its first day at the box office with an estimated ₹ 1.90 Cr in India net. On its second day, it earned around ₹ 2.35 Cr, bringing the total collection to ₹ 4.25 Cr.

Key Points:

  • Day 1 Box Office: ₹ 1.90 Cr
  • Day 2 Box Office: ₹ 2.35 Cr (early estimates)
  • Total Box Office Collection: ₹ 4.25 Cr
  • Overall Malayalam Occupancy: 44.39%

Occupancy Breakdown:

  • Kochi: 60.25%
  • Trivandrum: 36.25%
  • Bengaluru: 49.25%
  • Chennai: 51.33%
  • Kozhikode: 48.75%
  • Thrissur: 42.50%
  • Kollam: 46.25%
  • Kottayam: 52.50%
  • Hyderabad: 58.00%
  • NCR: 25.33%
  • Mumbai: 18.75%
Disclaimer: The Box Office Data are compiled from various sources and by our own research. These data can be approximate and Sacnilk does not make any claims about the authenticity of the data.

Overall, Rekhachithram shows promising performance, and further updates will follow.

title: Ajith Kumar reveals he will not sign any film until the race season is over: 'I plan to pursue motorsport - TOI Etimes
summary:
Ajith Kumar reveals he will not sign any film until the race season is over: 'I plan to pursue motorsports'

Date: October 2023

Source: To be determined

Ajith Kumar, a popular actor, has decided to take a hiatus from signing new film projects until the current racing season concludes. He expresses a strong commitment to pursuing his passion for motorsports during this time.

  • Ajith Kumar will not sign any new films.
  • He is focusing on his passion for motorsports.
  • The decision aligns with his personal and professional interests.
"I plan to pursue motorsports." - Ajith Kumar

This decision reflects Ajith's dedication to his interests outside of cinema, emphasizing the balance between his acting career and personal ambitions.

title: US hits Russian oil with toughest sanctions yet in bid to give Ukraine, Trump leverage - Reuters
‘Despicable charade, no merit’ says Donald Trump after unconditional discharge in hush money case - Hindustan Times
summary:
Trump Claims 'Witch Hunt' After Being Discharged in Hush Money Case

Date: Jan 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Donald Trump expressed his outrage over the Biden-Harris administration's actions against him, labeling it a 'witch hunt' after receiving an unconditional discharge in his hush money trial despite 34 felony counts.

  • Trump was convicted of 34 felony counts but received an unconditional discharge, avoiding jail time and fines.
  • He condemned the charges as baseless and claimed they were a result of political oppression.
  • Trump announced plans to appeal the case, which he called a 'hoax' and a 'scam'.
  • The case involved a $130,000 payment to an adult film star to prevent an affair from being disclosed during his presidential campaign.
“That result alone proves that, as all Legal Scholars and Experts have said, THERE IS NO CASE, THERE WAS NEVER A CASE, and this whole Scam fully deserves to be DISMISSED,” said Trump.

This case highlights the ongoing legal battles Trump faces and has reignited his claims of being unjustly targeted by political opponents.
newTitle: Trump Claims 'Witch Hunt' After Being Discharged in Hush Money Case

'Penalise if...': MP writes to minister after L&T chairman's '90-hour' remarks - Hindustan Times
summary:
MP Urges Labour Minister to Penalise Violations After L&T Chairman's Controversial '90-Hour' Workweek Remarks

Date: Jan 11, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Following remarks by L&T Chairman SN Subrahmanyan advocating for a 90-hour workweek, MP Raja Ram Singh has called for penalties against violations of working hour laws in India.

  • Subrahmanyan suggested working on Sundays, leading to widespread online outrage.
  • MP Raja Ram Singh referenced statements from prominent business figures advocating longer work hours.
  • Singh emphasized the negative impacts of long working hours on employee health and productivity.
  • He requested enforcement of existing labour laws to protect workers' rights and well-being.
  • Statistics from the International Labour Organization show India's workforce among the hardest working globally.
“It is important to note that not only does working longer hours not ensure increased productivity, but in fact reduces productivity.” - MP Raja Ram Singh

This incident highlights the need for a review of workplace practices and protections for employees in India.
newTitle: MP Urges Labour Minister to Penalise Violations After L&T Chairman's Controversial '90-Hour' Workweek Remarks

title: OnePlus 12 vs. OnePlus 13: Is it upgraded enough? [Video] - 9to5Google
summary:
OnePlus 12 vs. OnePlus 13: Is it upgraded enough?

Publication Date: January 7, 2025 | Source: 9to5Google

The OnePlus 12 has set a high bar for the OnePlus 13 to meet. In this article, we explore whether the OnePlus 13 offers significant upgrades or if the previous model remains a strong contender.

  • Similar design language between OnePlus 12 and 13.
  • Improvements in OxygenOS and hardware features.
  • The OnePlus 13 boasts an IP69 rating vs. IP65 for the OnePlus 12.
  • Battery capacity increased to 6,000 mAh with improved thermal management.
  • Camera comparisons highlight some downgrades in zoom capabilities for the OnePlus 13.
“Nobody who owns the OnePlus 12 should ditch their device in favor of the OnePlus 13.”

Ultimately, while both models are impressive, the OnePlus 12 remains a solid choice for existing users, with the OnePlus 13 being a worthy option for new buyers.
newTitle: OnePlus 12 vs. OnePlus 13: An In-Depth Comparison

10 natural sources of magnesium that are easily available - The Times of India
summary:
10 Natural Sources of Magnesium That Are Easily Available

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 Source: Times of India

Magnesium plays a vital role in maintaining healthy muscles, bones, and overall well-being. Here are 10 easily available natural sources of magnesium to help boost your daily intake.

  • Almonds: 270 mg per 100 grams
  • Pumpkin seeds: 168 mg per 100 grams
  • Black beans: 70 mg per 100 grams
  • Tofu: 30 mg per 100 grams
  • Avocados: Rich in magnesium
  • Dark chocolate: 228 mg per 100 grams
  • Chia seeds: 335 mg per 100 grams
  • Spinach: 79 mg per 100 grams
  • Bananas: 27 mg per 100 grams
  • Yogurt: 11 mg per 100 grams
“Magnesium is essential for muscle function and overall health.”

This article highlights the importance of including magnesium-rich foods in your diet for better health and well-being.
newTitle: 10 Natural Sources of Magnesium That Are Easily Available

title: This brain-boosting Indian herb is becoming popular globally; know all about it - The Times of India
summary:
This brain-boosting Indian herb is becoming popular globally; know all about it

Publication date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Bacopa, an ancient Indian herb used in Ayurvedic medicine, is gaining global popularity for its cognitive-enhancing properties. Research has shown significant improvements in memory, focus, and reducing inflammation after supplementation.

  • Bacopa monnieri, the most notable species, improves memory and cognitive functions.
  • A study involving 80 participants showed cognitive enhancements after 12 weeks of daily 300mg supplementation.
  • The herb contains bioactive compounds, particularly Bacosides, believed to enhance brain function.
  • Bacopa is also suggested to help alleviate neurological disorders and combat oxidative stress.
  • It is recommended to consume Bacopa in supplement form, with a maximum intake of 600 mg per day.
“Bacopa has become the latest must-have supplement to sharpen one's mind and boost cognitive performance.”

In conclusion, Bacopa is emerging as a valuable supplement for those looking to enhance their cognitive abilities and overall brain health.
newTitle: This brain-boosting Indian herb is becoming popular globally; know all about it

title: My thinking in 3rd term has changed vastly in terms of vision, scope: PM Modi on podcast with Nikhil Kama - The Times of India
summary:
My thinking in 3rd term has changed vastly in terms of vision, scope: PM Modi on podcast with Nikhil Kamath

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Prime Minister Narendra Modi discusses the evolution of his vision and approach in his third term during a podcast with entrepreneur Nikhil Kamath. He elaborates on the changes in his thought process and the broader implications for governance.

  • Modi emphasizes a significant shift in his perspective since starting his third term.
  • The Prime Minister talks about adapting to new challenges and visions for India's future.
  • He highlights the importance of encompassing a wider scope in governance.
“My vision has expanded, and I recognize the need for a broader approach in governance.”

Modi's comments underline his proactive stance on adjusting to evolving political landscapes and societal needs.
newTitle: PM Modi Shares Shift in Perspective for 3rd Term on Podcast

title: Rajiv Bajaj jumps in on ‘90-hr work week' debate: 'Quality of work matters, not time' - Hindustan Times
summary:
Rajiv Bajaj also said that if one wants 90-hour work week, it should start from the top.

Publication Date: Jan 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Amid an online outrage over Larsen & Toubro (L&T) chairperson's “90-hour work week” remarks, Bajaj Auto's managing director Rajiv Bajaj has said that the quality of work done matters much more than the hours.

In an interview with CNBC TV18, Rajiv Bajaj emphasized that if there is to be a 90-hour work week, it should originate from the leadership. He stated, "Number of hours of work doesn't matter, the quality of work does. We need a kinder, gentler world more than ever before."

Key Points:

  • Rajiv Bajaj argues that quality of work is more important than the number of hours worked.
  • Bajaj suggests that the idea of a 90-hour work week should start from company leaders.
  • He stresses the importance of work-life balance and the consequences of long working hours.
  • The controversy originated from remarks made by L&T chairman SN Subrahmanyan advocating for longer work hours.
"Even if someone works 70 or 90 hours a week, their life remains interconnected with other aspects - family, health, and well-being. Ignoring this interconnectedness will come at a cost."

In conclusion, Bajaj calls for a shift away from rigid work hours towards a more flexible approach that values quality and interconnectedness in life.
newTitle: Rajiv Bajaj Addresses Controversy Over 90-Hour Work Week Remarks

title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah's Gurucharan Singh is not eating any food, he is very unwell, says friend Bhakti Soni - Hindustan Times
summary:
Gurucharan Singh of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah Hospitalized and Struggling with Health

Date: Jan 10, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Gurucharan Singh, known for his role in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah, is currently hospitalized in Mumbai. His friend Bhakti Soni has shared updates about his deteriorating health, stating he has stopped eating and is very weak.

  • Bhakti Soni revealed that Gurucharan has been unable to eat solid food for three months and has only consumed a liquid diet.
  • He fell unconscious recently due to not drinking water as well.
  • Gurucharan's family is reportedly facing financial difficulties, which may have contributed to his condition.
  • His friend Bhakti mentioned that attempts to communicate with Gurucharan have been unsuccessful as his family’s phones are switched off.
“I haven’t spoken to Gurucharan. I don’t know what’s happening with him, but from what I heard last, he is very weak.” - Bhakti Soni

Gurucharan shared a video from his hospital bed on Instagram, stating his condition has worsened and he will update fans about his health soon.
newTitle: Gurucharan Singh of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah Hospitalized and Struggling with Health

title: Donald Trump 1st US President To Be Sentenced As Felon, But Avoids Jail, Penalty - NDTV
summary:
Donald Trump Becomes First US President Sentenced as Felon, Escapes Jail Time

Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Donald Trump has made history by becoming the first felon in the White House, as a US court upholds his conviction in a hush money case. Although he was sentenced to an 'unconditional discharge', he will not serve jail time due to his position as President-elect.

  • Trump was convicted of falsifying business records related to payments made to Stormy Daniels.
  • He faced potential jail time of four years but was spared due to presidential immunity.
  • Judge Juan Merchan described the circumstances as unique and remarked on the legal implications of sentencing a sitting president.
  • Trump did not attend the court session in person and instead appeared virtually.
  • He characterized the legal proceedings as damaging to his reputation and a setback for the New York court system.
"This court has determined that the only lawful sentence that permits entry of a judgement of conviction without encroaching on the highest office of the land, is an unconditional discharge." - Judge Juan Merchan
"It was done to damage my reputation, just so that I may lose the election." - Donald Trump

In a significant ruling, this event illustrates the complexities of legal accountability at the highest levels of government, setting a precedent for the future.
newTitle: Donald Trump Becomes First US President Sentenced as Felon, Escapes Jail Time
